sen.j: 高丘氏（たかおかし）は日本の氏族のひとつ。
sen.e: Takaoka shi is one of clans of Japan.
Takaoka Clan was one of the clans of Japan.
sen.cmt: Takaoka shi →Takaoka Clanに変更しました。theを追加しました。全文を通して現在形で書かれていますが、過去形のほうが適切な箇所が多く、書き換えました。is→was に変更しました。
sen.e: Takaoka Clan was one of the clans of Japan.

sen.j: 【高丘家（藤原姓）】藤原北家藤原公季流（閑院流）藪家（高倉家）庶流中園家の支流に出づ。
sen.e: "Takaoka family (Fujiwara cognomen)" Derives from the branch family of Nakazono of the FUJIWARA no Kinsuke line (one of the Fujiwara clique) of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
"Takaoka family (Fujiwara cognomen)"- Derived from the branch family of Nakazono of the FUJIWARA no Kinsuke line (one of the Fujiwara clique) of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
sen.cmt: 【】は半角では出せないので、" "と-で置き換えました。DerivesをDerived に変更しました。
sen.e: "Takaoka family (Fujiwara cognomen)"- Derived from the branch family of Nakazono of the FUJIWARA no Kinsuke line (one of the Fujiwara clique) of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
The family status is the Urin family.
The family status was the Urin family.
The family status was the Urin family.
The family crest is 'dakigyoyo in a circle'.
The family crest was 'gyoyo (apricot leaf) in a circle'.
sen.cmt: is→was に変更しました。丸に抱き杏葉→訳文の解釈,間違っていると思います。家紋の形を表す言葉なのでもう少し踏み込んだ訳でないと、英文として理解できません。変更しています。定訳なしです。
sen.e: The family crest was 'gyoyo (apricot leaf) in a circle'.

sen.j: 藤原季定の子季起が高丘の号を称す。
sen.e: Sueoki, son of FUJIWARA no Suesada began to use the name of Takaoka.
Sueoki, son of FUJIWARA no Suesada began to use the name of Takaoka.
Sueoki, son of FUJIWARA no Suesada began to use the name of Takaoka.
*Refer to the Takaoka family for details.
Refer to the Takaoka family for details.
sen.cmt: 用語統一より、＊を削除しました。
sen.e: Refer to the Takaoka family for details.

sen.j: 【高陵氏高穆後裔】秦王族高陵君参の後裔、高陵氏高穆より出る渡来系一族。
sen.e: "Descendant of Koboku of Koryo shi"Immigrant family that derives from Koboku of Koryo shi, the descendant of Qin's royal family Koryo kun.
sen.cmt: 「高穆」、「高陵君」の読みを調べたところ見つからなかったため、文中ではそれぞれ「こうぼく」、「こうりょうくん」として訳しました。
sen.e: "Descendant of Koboku of Koryo shi"-Immigrant family that derived from Koboku of Koryo shi, the descendant of Qin's royal family Koryo kun.
sen.cmt: 【】は半角では出せないので、" "と-で置き換えました。derives→derivedに変更しました。
sen.e: "Descendant of Koboku of Koryo shi"-Immigrant family that derived from Koboku of Koryo shi, the descendant of Qin's royal family Koryo kun.

sen.j: 渡来僧の楽浪（さざなみ）詠の子、河内が姓高丘宿祢、のち高丘連を賜う。
sen.e: Kawachi, the son of Ei Sazanami who was a monk from overseas, was given the name of Sukune TAKAOKA and later that of the Takaoka Ren by the emperor.
Kawachi, the son of Ei Sazanami who was a monk from overseas, was given the name of Sukune TAKAOKA and later that of the Takaoka Ren by the Emperor.
sen.cmt: emperor大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: Kawachi, the son of Ei Sazanami who was a monk from overseas, was given the name of Sukune TAKAOKA and later that of the Takaoka Ren by the Emperor.

sen.j: 応仁の乱の頃まで京都の官人・武人として名を見る。
sen.e: He was well known as a government official and warrior of Kyoto until around the time of the Onin War.
He was well known as a government official and warrior of Kyoto until around the time of the Onin War.
He was well known as a government official and warrior of Kyoto until around the time of the Onin War.

sen.j: のち摂津国川辺郡梶ケ島村（尼崎）に移る一族。
sen.e: The family later moved to Kajigashima mura (Amagasaki), Kawabe gun, Settsu province.
The family later moved to Kajigashima mura (Amagasaki), Kawabe gun, Settsu Province.
sen.cmt: (Amagasaki),のスペースを削除しました。province大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: The family later moved to Kajigashima mura (Amagasaki), Kawabe gun, Settsu Province.
